actor_awards.notes: Despite his legendary status, Lorre never received an Academy Award nomination.

filmography.title: M
filmography.role_description: A disturbed child murderer who is hunted by both the police and the criminal underworld in Fritz Lang's masterpiece.
filmography.plot: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

filmography.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
filmography.role_description: The chilling leader of a spy ring who kidnaps a young girl to ensure her father's silence.
filmography.plot: A man and his wife receive a clue to an assassination plot, but their child is kidnapped to prevent them from talking.

filmography.title: Mad Love
filmography.role_description: An obsessed surgeon who grafts the hands of a murderer onto the husband of the woman he loves.
filmography.plot: A mad doctor replaces the crushed hands of a pianist with the hands of a knife-throwing murderer.

filmography.title: Crime and Punishment
filmography.role_description: A brilliant but tormented student who commits a murder to prove his theory of the 'superman'.
filmography.plot: A man commits a crime and is pursued by a persistent police inspector while battling his own conscience.

filmography.title: Secret Agent
filmography.role_description: A flamboyant and ruthless assassin who aids a British spy in Switzerland.
filmography.plot: Three British spies are sent to Switzerland to assassinate a German agent, but they are unsure of his identity.

filmography.title: Think Fast, Mr. Moto
filmography.role_description: The polite, judo-chopping Japanese detective who solves crimes; the first of Lorre's popular series.
filmography.plot: Mr. Moto investigates a diamond smuggling ring that is using a commercial freighter to move goods.

filmography.title: Thank You, Mr. Moto
filmography.role_description: Mr. Moto races against criminals to find seven ancient scrolls that reveal the location of Genghis Khan's treasure.
filmography.plot: Mr. Moto must find the missing scrolls to a treasure map before a ruthless gang gets them.

filmography.title: Strange Cargo
filmography.role_description: A treacherous, sniveling informant in a penal colony who betrays his fellow convicts.
filmography.plot: Prisoners escape from Devil's Island and are influenced by a mysterious stranger who may be divine.

filmography.title: The Face Behind the Mask
filmography.role_description: A gentle immigrant whose face is disfigured in a fire, turning him into a bitter criminal mastermind.
filmography.plot: A disfigured immigrant becomes a crime lord, but tries to leave the life when he falls in love.

filmography.title: The Maltese Falcon
filmography.role_description: A gardenia-scented, effeminate international criminal who is searching for the coveted black bird.
filmography.plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

filmography.title: All Through the Night
filmography.role_description: A menacing Nazi agent operating in New York City who murders a baker, sparking an investigation by local gamblers.
filmography.plot: A gambler and his cronies uncover a Nazi fifth-column organization in New York City and decide to take matters into their own hands.

filmography.title: Casablanca
filmography.role_description: A nervous, petty criminal who provides the crucial letters of transit to Rick before being arrested.
filmography.plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

filmography.title: The Cross of Lorraine
filmography.role_description: A sadistic Nazi guard at a prisoner-of-war camp who enjoys tormenting the French captives.
filmography.plot: A group of French soldiers surrender to the Germans expecting to be sent home, but are instead imprisoned in a brutal camp.

filmography.title: Passage to Marseille
filmography.role_description: A patriotic French convict who escapes Devil's Island to fight for the Free French forces.
filmography.plot: Five patriotic convicts escape Devil's Island to fight for Free French forces, becoming a bomber crew in England.

filmography.title: The Mask of Dimitrios
filmography.role_description: A Dutch mystery writer who becomes intrigued by the history of a dead criminal and uncovers a dangerous conspiracy.
filmography.plot: A writer becomes fascinated by the criminal file of a dead man and discovers he may not be as dead as reported.

filmography.title: Arsenic and Old Lace
filmography.role_description: A nervous, alcoholic plastic surgeon who is the reluctant accomplice to a serial killer, often botching the surgeries.
filmography.plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

filmography.title: The Conspirators
filmography.role_description: A member of the anti-Nazi underground in Lisbon who aids a Dutch resistance leader.
filmography.plot: A Dutch resistance fighter escapes to Lisbon and joins a group of conspirators plotting against the Nazis.

filmography.title: The Verdict
filmography.role_description: An artist and friend to a disgraced Scotland Yard superintendent who becomes a suspect in a locked-room murder mystery.
filmography.plot: A disgraced Scotland Yard superintendent sets out to prove he was right about a case, but his methods become extreme.

filmography.title: Three Strangers
filmography.role_description: A petty criminal who shares a winning sweepstakes ticket with two strangers, leading to a web of greed and murder.
filmography.plot: Three strangers share a sweepstakes ticket before the statue of a Chinese goddess, but the ticket brings them only trouble.

filmography.title: The Beast with Five Fingers
filmography.role_description: A deranged secretary who believes the disembodied hand of his dead employer is committing murders.
filmography.plot: After a famous pianist dies, his severed hand appears to return to life to exact revenge on those who wronged him.

filmography.title: My Favorite Brunette
filmography.role_description: A knife-wielding henchman who menaces Bob Hope in this parody of hard-boiled detective movies.
filmography.plot: A baby photographer dreaming of being a private eye gets mixed up in a murder mystery involving a baron and a secret map.

filmography.title: Casbah
filmography.role_description: A patient and cunning police inspector in Algiers who waits for the thief Pepe Le Moko to leave the safety of the Casbah.
filmography.plot: A musical remake of 'Algiers', detailing the efforts of a thief to escape the Casbah and the inspector who watches him.

filmography.title: Rope of Sand
filmography.role_description: A philosophical drifter and opportunist who becomes involved in a diamond hunting expedition in Africa.
filmography.plot: A man returns to a South African diamond mine to recover a stash of gems he hid years earlier, facing off against a sadistic police chief.

filmography.title: Quicksand
filmography.role_description: A seedy arcade owner who blackmails a young mechanic, forcing him deeper into a life of crime.
filmography.plot: A young mechanic 'borrows' money from his employer's cash register, sparking a chain of events that plunges him into a life of crime.

filmography.title: Beat the Devil
filmography.role_description: A fraudulent, philosophizing criminal associate in a group of eccentric con artists stranded in Italy.
filmography.plot: A quartet of international crooks are stranded in Italy while their steamer is being repaired, engaging in various schemes and double-crosses.

filmography.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
filmography.role_description: The loyal and calm assistant to Professor Aronnax who accompanies him aboard Captain Nemo's submarine.
filmography.plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine Nautilus, commanded by the mysterious Captain Nemo.

filmography.title: Around the World in 80 Days
filmography.role_description: A cameo role as a steward on the SS Carnatic in this star-studded adaptation of the Jules Verne novel.
filmography.plot: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

filmography.title: Silk Stockings
filmography.role_description: One of three Soviet commissars who are seduced by the capitalist lifestyle of Paris in this musical remake of Ninotchka.
filmography.plot: A Soviet official is sent to Paris to retrieve three wayward composers but is charmed by the capitalist lifestyle.

filmography.title: The Story of Mankind
filmography.role_description: Lorre portrays the Roman Emperor Nero in a segment of this fantasy film debating the worth of humanity.
filmography.plot: The Spirit of Mankind and the Devil argue over whether humanity is worth saving, using examples from history.

filmography.title: The Big Circus
filmography.role_description: A circus clown who provides comic relief and support to the circus owner facing financial ruin.
filmography.plot: A circus owner fights to keep his show on the road despite sabotage and financial troubles.

filmography.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
filmography.role_description: A scientist and naval officer who assists Admiral Nelson in a mission to save the Earth from a burning radiation belt.
filmography.plot: The crew of a nuclear submarine must race to save the world when the Van Allen radiation belt catches fire.

filmography.title: Tales of Terror
filmography.role_description: A vengeful husband who walls up his wife and her lover in the 'The Black Cat' segment of this Poe anthology.
filmography.plot: Three stories adapted from Edgar Allan Poe: a grieving widower, a vengeful husband, and a man mesmerized at the moment of death.

filmography.title: The Raven
filmography.role_description: A bumbling, transformed wizard who seeks the help of a sorcerer to regain his human form in this horror-comedy.
filmography.plot: A magician who has been turned into a raven turns to a former sorcerer for help in this comedic adaptation of Poe's poem.

filmography.title: The Comedy of Terrors
filmography.role_description: The bumbling assistant to a murderous undertaker who helps create new customers for the business.
filmography.plot: An undertaker who hasn't had any customers lately decides to go out and create some by killing people.
